TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but your only in the sea because your being used by a fisherman as fish bait.

I wish I was wearing pants.

Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy's magical tutu is on you, and his-er inappropriates turn you to stone.

I wish for free and advertisement-less entertainment services.

Granted. They don't last very long because they have no income, kinda like Reddit will.

I wish Reddit was no longer in the red.

Granted, but then the NSA shuts Reddit down, because the NSA

I wish that air was toxic.

Granted. Air was toxic to anaerobic and ancient bacteria.

I wish I had electrons.

Granted. You now contain all the electrons. This is a bad thing.

I wish I could explain my corruption properly.

Granted, but you are summarily executed before you get the chance to elaborate.

I wish for a new book to read.

Granted, it's Twilight.

I wish I was a Kerbal.

Granted, you are Danny2462's new test subject.

I wish for more wish ideas

Granted. You now have so many ideas that you are electrocuted by the electrical current that now must travel through your brain to sustain it.

I wish that that next Rayman game will include Mr. Dark as the villain.

Granted. but hes so dark, you cant see him get outraged at the game and die from heart attack.

I wish i didnt kill so many people when corrupting the wishes.

Granted. They all come to live with you as house guests instead.

I wish they'd fix the roads around here.

Granted. The roads are now sentient and not willing to be driven on, at threat of comet-apocalypse.

I wish I had all the comets.

Granted. You are now in space, without a spacesuit, in the center of the giant mass of comets. You don't live very long...

I wish for Tristam (yes, with an M) to release a new song.

Granted. It's Baby - Dubstep Remix

I wish that bees. Again.

Granted. The bees take over the world

I wish for (insert something here).

Granted. You receive a generic gray box with a button that opens it. The anticipation causes your head to explode.

I wish for a backstabber gun.

Granted, but this is the USSR, so gun back stabs you!

I wish I could breath

Granted. You breath fire, which causes your throat to burn up, and thus you DIE :3

I wish for a remote control booster, which comes with a bunker to test/fire into space/explodify the engine right outside your repurposed nuclear bunker!

Granted! It doesn't happen cause screw your wish! *Walks away*

I wish for nukez

Granted. The nukez are given to Jebediah Kerman. 'Nuff Said (also, screw YOUR wish )

I wish 9 out of 10 people worldwide would prefer waffles over pancakes

They search the world for waffles, and tear up you and your house in the process.

I wish for an inert cake.

Inert cake? Granted! It has high inertion and kills you!

I wish for the school to already end.

Granted. A giant, indestructible floating clock appears over your school. It repeatedly smashes your school with you and ONLY you in it.

I wish for a bigger solid fuel engine for my rocket.

Granted, but the increased strain on your rockets joints welcome the Kraken to a party.

I wish for even more stockalike mods!
